channel.title: [PI] Modicons FIX - HELP

item.title: [PI] Modicons FIX - HELP
item.dc:creator: @MrFear752 MrFear752
item.description:
@MrFear752 wrote:

Okay so In server (side) I go to commands, do the c.playerRights 5 compile it compiles correctly, I put my character file number 5 to test if the modicon works, Client Sided… I go to client.java in client side, I add @cr5@ where it needs to be placed, in every section. case 5:
modIcons[5].drawSprite(xPos, yPos - 12);
xPos += 14;
break; and there was other ones I did, I did all the “PushMessage” and “Bytes”. I compile everything works, I login to the server, I type and it doesn’t show the Modicon, Also In my cache, i go to sprites>player> and add the MODICON 5. Please help!

Read full topic
